name: Where's the Ground?
description:
Title: Where's the Ground?

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer/Puzzle Game

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview:  

“Where’s the Ground?” is a new addition to the platforming genre that has a great balance of chance as well as skill through progression during your journey as Little Red. Little Red fell into the Spike Factory which is very dangerous. Jump into this new and improved puzzle-solver which requires you to use your wits, memory, and movement skills all in combination to try to get Little Red back to his family.

Instructions: Arrow Keys to Move Left and Right, SpaceBar to jump.

Steve Salah – Game Designer

NEED TO USE FULLSCREEN!!!
